COMMITTEE ON THE JUDICIARY
February 23, 1967
Mr. Myron M. Curry
KFJM Radio
Grand Forks, North Dakota
Dear Mr. Curry:
Thank you for your letter about educational radio
Will await the survey on present use with great
interest. Your clear statement will assist my analysis of
this proposal when presented to the Senate.
With best regards.
Sincerely,
U. S. Senator
Nebraska
